jsDoc.doc: Builder for [Json data values](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#json).

tags.name: value
tags.doc: A value that can be serialized to JSON.
const json = Json.build(2022);
{@link https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#json|Qworum specification}

jsDoc.doc: Serialises the object to string for informational purposes.
Builder for [semantic data values](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#semantic).

tags.name: value
tags.doc: The semantic data value.

tags.name: type
tags.doc: The type of the semantic data value. One of 'turtle', 'trig', 'n-triples', 'n-quads'. Default is 'turtle'.
{@link https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#semantic|Qworum specification}

jsDoc.doc: Async RDF dataset reader.

tags.name: text
tags.doc: Text in one of these RDF formats: Turtle, TriG, N-Triples, N-Quads

tags.name: baseIRI
tags.doc: The URL of the RDF document

jsDoc.doc: Async RDF dataset reader.

tags.name: text
tags.doc: Text in one of these RDF formats: Turtle, TriG, N-Triples, N-Quads

tags.name: baseIRI
tags.doc: The URL of the RDF document

jsDoc.doc: RDF dataset serialiser.

tags.name: type
tags.doc: One of: turtle, trig, n-triples, n-quads

jsDoc.doc: Serialises the object to string for informational purposes.
Builder for [Return instructions](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#return).

tags.name: statement
tags.doc: The instruction or data value to evaluate.
const return1 = Return.build(Json.build(2022));
{@link https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#return|Qworum specification}

jsDoc.doc: Serialises the object to string for informational purposes.
Builder for [Sequence instructions](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#sequence).

tags.name: statements
tags.doc: Statements.
const sequence = Sequence.build(Json.build(2022));
{@link https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#sequence|Qworum specification}

jsDoc.doc: Serialises the object to string for informational purposes.
Builder for [Data instructions](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#data).

tags.name: path
tags.doc: The path of the data container.

tags.name: statement
tags.doc: An instruction or data value.
const data1 = Data.build('data1', Json.build(2022)); // Writing
const data2 = Data.build('data1'); // Reading
{@link https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#data|Qworum specification}

jsDoc.doc: Serialises the object to string for informational purposes.
Builder function for [Try instructions](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#try).

tags.name: statement
tags.doc: A statement (instruction or data value) or a non-empty array of statements.

tags.name: catchClauses
tags.doc: One catch clause or an array of catch clauses.
{@link https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#try|Qworum specification}

jsDoc.doc: Serialises the object to string for informational purposes.
Builder for [Goto instructions](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#goto).

tags.name: href
tags.doc: The URL of the new call phase. Can be a relative or absolute URL.
const goto = Goto.build('home/');
{@link https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#goto|Qworum specification}

jsDoc.doc: Serialises the object to string for informational purposes.
Builder for [Call instructions](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#call).

tags.name: object
tags.doc: The path of the Qworum object to call.

tags.name: href
tags.doc: The URL of the end-point to call. Can be a relative or absolute URL.

tags.name: parameters
tags.doc: Named data value arguments.

tags.name: objectParameters
tags.doc: Named Qworum object arguments.
const call1 = Call.build('@', 'home/');
{@link https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#call|Qworum specification}

jsDoc.doc: Serialises the object to string for informational purposes.
Builder for [Qworum scripts](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#script).

tags.name: instruction
tags.doc: The root instruction to execute.
{@link https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#script|Qworum specification}

jsDoc.doc: Serialises the object to string for informational purposes.
Builder for [Fault instructions](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#fault). Suitable for service-specific faults only.

tags.name: type
tags.doc: The type of the raised fault.
const fault = Fault.build('payment cancelled');
{@link https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#fault|Qworum specification}

jsDoc.doc: Serialises the object to string for informational purposes.

Web pages can use the Qworum capabilities of web browsers through this JavaScript class.

These are the main methods that web pages use:

- `eval()` evaluates a Qworum script.
- `setData()` sets the value of a data container.
- `getData()` reads the value of a data container.

Other methods:

- `checkAvailability()` verifies that Qworum is available on the user's web browser.

All these methods are asynchronous.

tags.doc:
Storing data in the current Qworum method call.

await Qworum.setData('year', Qworum.Json(2024));

jsDoc.doc:
Checks that:

- the Qworum browser extension is installed and running, and
- the website's [origin](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Glossary/Origin) is part of Qworum's Service Web.

tags.doc: Can throw an Error.

jsDoc.doc:
Evaluates a Qworum script.

The outcome is one of:
- Redirection to a new URL (the current Qworum session continues).
- Closing of the browser tab after displaying an alert window (the current Qworum session has terminated).

tags.doc: Can throw a TypeError or Error.
[Qworum specification](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#script)

jsDoc.doc: Sets the value contained in a data container.

tags.name: path
tags.doc: - The path of the data container.
Can throw a TypeError or Error.
[Qworum specification](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#data)

jsDoc.doc: Reads a value contained in a data container.

tags.name: path
tags.doc: - The path of the data container.
- The value in the data container, or null if the value is not set. Can throw a TypeError or Error.
[Qworum specification](https://qworum.net/en/specification/v1/#data)
